title: Game 42: Pawtucket 5, RailRiders 4
maintext: RailRiders Pawtucket ab r h bi ab r h bi Wade ss 5 1 1 0 Lin 3b 4 0 0 0 Frazier lf 4 1 2 1 Tavarez rf 4 1 1 1 Drury 3b 3 1 1 1 Travis lf 4 0 0 0 Bird 1b 3 1 1 2 Olt 1b 3 2 1 1 Lind dh 4 0 2 0 De Jesus 2b 4 0 0 0 McKinney rf 4 0 0 0 Flores dh 3 1 2 0 Robinson cf 3 0 0 0 Butler c 2 1 0 1 Kratz c 3 0 0 0 Sturgeon cf 4 0 2 2 Navarro 2b 3 0 0 0 Miller ss 3 0 0 0 Ford ph 1 0 0 0 Totals 33 4 7 4 Totals 31 5 6 5 RailRiders 301 000 000 — 4 Pawtucket 020 100 11x — 5 LOB: RailRiders 6, Pawtucket 6. 2B: Lind (4), Sturgeon 2 (2), Flores (5). HR: Frazier (4), Bird (1), Olt (6), Tavarez (2). SB: Robinson (6), Tavarez (5), Flores (2). E: Bird (1, fielding), Kratz (2, throw), Beeks (2, pickoff). RailRiders IP H R ER BB SO Swanson 5.2 4 3 3 2 8 Lail (BS, 1) (L, 4-2) 1.2 2 2 2 2 1 Harvey .2 0 0 0 0 1 Pawtucket IP H R ER BB SO Beeks 6 7 4 3 0 6 Velazquez 1 0 0 0 0 1 Maddox (W, 1-0) 1 0 0 0 4 1 Brasier (S, 3) 1 0 0 0 0 0 Umpires: HP: Tosi, 1B: Wills, 3B: Costello. A: 3,719. T: 2:48. How they scored RailRiders first: Beeks pitching. Wade popped out. Frazier homered. Drury singled. Bird homered, Drury scored. RailRiders 3, Pawtucket 0. Pawtucket second: Swanson pitching. Olt homered. De Jesus lined out. Flores struck out. Butler walked. Sturgeon doubled, Butler scored. RailRiders 3, Pawtucket 2. RailRiders third: Wade singled. Frazier flied out. With Drury batting, Wade to third on throwing error by Beeks on pickoff attempt. Drury grounded out, Wade scored. RailRiders 4, Pawtucket 2. Pawtucket fourth: De Jesus flied out. Flores doubled. Butler popped out. Sturgeon doubled, Flores scored. RailRiders 4, Pawtucket 3. Pawtucket seventh: Lail pitching. Miller flied out. Lin flied out. Tavarez homered. RailRiders 4, Pawtucket 4. Pawtucket eighth: Olt walked. De Jesus flied out. Flores singled, Olt to third. Harvey pitching. Butler grounded into a force out, Olt scored, Flores out at second, Butler to first. Pawtucket 5, RailRiders 4. Today’s game RailRiders (19-23) at Pawtucket (18-22), McCoy Stadium, Pawtucket, Rhode Island, 6:15 p.m. Probable pitchers: RailRiders RHP Chance Adams (1-2, 4.69) vs. Pawtucket RHP William Cuevas (1-2, 4.06) Off the rails ■ 1B Greg Bird (ankle) and OF Billy McKinney (shoulder) had their rehab assignments officially transferred to the RailRiders on Monday. Both played three games at High-A Tampa, then spent the last five with Double-A Trenton. Bird, who has yet to play in the majors this season, is 4 for 23 (.174) on the stint, but homered his last time out. He has worked eight walks and struck out four times. McKinney, who sprained his shoulder crashing into the outfield wall in the Yankees’ second game of the season, is 6 for 26 (.231) with two doubles, seven walks and six strikeouts. ■ The Yankees recalled RHP Giovanny Gallegos and optioned OF Clint Frazier back to the RailRiders. Frazier reported to SWB on Monday and started in left field against Pawtucket. ■ RHP Erik Swanson was promoted to the RailRiders from Double-A Trenton on Monday and made the start against Pawtucket. To make room, RHP Brody Koerner was sent down to Trenton. — STAFF REPORT IL standings North W L Pct.
